author: andschwa
body:
- Bumped packages to rc-23729
- Enabled Linux configuration
- Add `dnx451` framework
- Add FullCLR build script

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This requires PowerShell/psl-monad#10; please note that some changes are still forthcoming.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Guess what! Linux.Host managed shell now works just fine on Windows.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Travis CI is currently processing a large backlog of builds and so won't get to this for a [while](https://www.traviscistatus.com/). Since f42cf5985feb99d8d55a27249eade6a8dfa28563 passed with 0 failed tests, and 89d62012e88c5556c3b47d760592d35b6cf4ef57 simply sets the test failure threshold to 0, and we have a sign-off from Paul, I'm going to merge this now.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Ah, it finally ran. And then failed because the branch was deleted. But `master` is building right now.

title: Enable FullCLR side-by-side support
